description: Standard uniform for life lived outside the lines, this comfy and versatile hoodie is a wardrobe staple that draws inspiration from adventures near and far. Because it’s full-zip, sudden temperature changes are a cinch. Because it’s made from organic cotton and recycled polyester, comfort is a given. Made in a Fair Trade Certified™ factory, this hoodie makes for the perfect travel companion, no matter where you’re headed.
name: Cotopaxi Cotopaxi Full-Zip Hoodie - Mens
